metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6251 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in CPUMiner before 2.4.1 allows remoteattackers to have an unspecified impact by sending a mining.subscriberesponse with a large nonce2 length, then triggering the overflow with amining.notify request.

criterions.comment: cgminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
